channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA Corporation -- GeForce Experience
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA Corporation -- GeForce Experience

item.title: CVE-2018-6263|2024-09-17T02:00:32.427Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- geforce%20experience
item.description: NVIDIA GeForce Experience contains a vulnerability in all versions prior to 3.16 on Windows in which an attacker who has access to a local user account can plant a malicious dynamic link library (DLL) during application installation, which may lead to escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-6261|2024-09-17T02:06:44.561Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- geforce%20experience
item.description: NVIDIA GeForce Experience prior to 3.15 contains a vulnerability when GameStream is enabled which sets incorrect permissions on a file, which may to code execution, denial of service, or escalation of privileges by users with system access.
